name: Bravo Force vs Modern Robot-s
description:
Get ready for an ultimate robot war game.Become a part of Robot Battle between commando and robot.Let’s go ! Prepare yourself with deadly sniper rifles, assault rifles to join the dire battlefield.An ultimate survival adventure! Fight like a superhero.Maybe you are the frontline commando or the professional sniper who can carry out impossible missions ? Whoever you are, hear the call of duty in your heart from battlefield.Army military has chosen you a special ops mission.You are one of the commando by the army military do fight to robo in war & perform various special ops mission.
You are a well-trained Commando of a rebel assault against deadly robot enemies.You should utilize the greater part of your specific abilities to survive the assault of the foe compels and retaliate for your fallen troopers.Arm yourself with lethal professional killer weapons and the most recent military apparatus to finish incognito battle missions.So go ahead Commando, kill your treacherous enemies and save the area.
The most advanced Action Shooting Game for you to Play and feel yourself like Commando.The solid, astounding looking 3D FPS rifleman shooting game action game you've been expecting is here.It’s a modern war & you need to win it all costs.You are the shooter military army has so they are depending on your shooting skills.Your modern weapons & guns are going to help you win this combat.Enemy will try to strike by shooting there modern weapons & guns at you so be ready to counter their attacks.You have earned the title of a hero by always performing your duty & completing given missions successfully. Now is your chance to prove that you are the best beast warrior.
Features:
1.Amazing shooting environments
2.Highly challenging stealth spy missions
3.Smooth and intuitive controls
4.Stunning & High Quality 3D Graphics
5.Battle against robot enemies with fighting strength
